abstract: Investors in Berkshire Hathaway had expected some disappointing news from the holding company’s chief, Warren E. Buffett. But perhaps they didn’t expect the Sage of Omaha’s investment vehicle to be so badly wounded by what he once called “financial weapons of mass destruction.”

headline.main: Berkshire Profit Falls 64% on Derivatives Exposure
